p.k: The battle of the two prophetesses
p.d: Two churches stand opposite one another in the same narrow street. Prophetess Marguerite from one is suing Prophetess Mateki from the other, for causing public disorder. The plaintiff evokes the various ploys used by her colleague to prevent her from re-opening her church, closed for some time due to works. Directed by: Anselm Nfa (Ivory Coast, season 2, 2019) Cast: Sonia Aka (judge Savhera), Fredy Alain Gires Ayemou (officer Wanderma), Dehe Ange Kader (officer Sandro) Genre: comedy drama
